name: Dimension Traveler
description: Strange portals have begun appearing across the realm,
leading to mysterious dimensions beyond comprehension.
Master the art of dimensional travel and explore
the infinite possibilities that lie beyond our world.

dialogs.start1: The barriers between dimensions grow thin, traveler.
dialogs.start2: You have the potential to walk between worlds.
dialogs.start3: But first, you must learn to harness dimensional energy.
dialogs.progress1: Your mastery over dimensional forces grows stronger.
dialogs.progress2: Each portal reveals new secrets of the multiverse.
dialogs.complete1: You have become a true master of dimensional travel!
dialogs.complete2: The infinite realms await your exploration, Dimension Traveler.
